featuresSection.title: [es] Features
featuresSection.subtitle: [es] These are just a few of the features offered to help you grow!

items.title: [es] Step-by-Step Guidance
items.description: [es] Get clear, easy-to-follow instructions for any tech question. Each step is explained in simple terms with visual cues.

items.title: [es] Voice Support
items.description: [es] Ask questions with your voice and have answers read aloud. Perfect for hands-free help when you need it most.

items.title: [es] Photo Explainer
items.description: [es] Take a photo of any cable, button, or device and get an instant explanation of what it is and how to use it.

items.title: [es] Senior-Friendly Design
items.description: [es] Large text, intuitive interface, and patient explanations designed specifically with seniors in mind.

items.title: [es] Safe & Secure
items.description: [es] Your personal information is protected with enterprise-grade security. No data shared with third parties.

items.title: [es] Instant Answers
items.description: [es] Get immediate help 24/7. No waiting on hold or scheduling appointments. Just ask and get answers.

popularQuestionsSection.title: [es] Popular Questions We Help With
popularQuestionsSection.subtitle: [es] See what other seniors are asking about

testimonialsSection.title: [es] What Our Community Says
testimonialsSection.subtitle: [es] Join thousands of seniors who've found tech help made simple

testimonialContent.name: [es] Margaret K.
testimonialContent.content: [es] Finally, someone who explains technology in a way I can understand! The step-by-step instructions helped me set up my new phone perfectly. I feel so much more confident now!

testimonialContent.name: [es] Robert H.
testimonialContent.content: [es] The voice feature is amazing! I can just ask my questions out loud and get clear answers. It's like having a tech-savvy grandchild available 24/7.

testimonialContent.name: [es] Dorothy S.
testimonialContent.content: [es] I love the photo feature! I took a picture of a confusing cable and instantly knew what it was for. This app has made me much more confident with technology.

testimonialContent.name: [es] Frank M.
testimonialContent.content: [es] I was so frustrated with my smart TV until I found this helper. Now I can stream shows, adjust settings, and even video chat with my grandkids!

ctaSection.title: [es] Ready to Master Technology?
ctaSection.subtitle: [es] Join our community of empowered seniors who've made technology simple and approachable. Start getting clear, helpful answers today - completely free!

footer.description: [es] Making technology accessible and understandable for seniors everywhere.

deviceBasics.title: Conceptos B√°sicos del Dispositivo
deviceBasics.description: Aprende c√≥mo encender y apagar tu dispositivo de forma segura
deviceBasics.content:
Encender y Apagar tu Dispositivo

Cada dispositivo tiene un bot√≥n de encendido. Aprendamos a usarlo de forma segura.

Para Computadoras:

  • ‚Ä¢ Busca un bot√≥n redondo con s√≠mbolo de encendido (‚èª)
  • ‚Ä¢ Presi√≥nalo una vez para encender
  • ‚Ä¢ Para apagar: Usa el men√∫ Inicio, luego "Apagar"
  • ‚Ä¢ ¬°Nunca solo presiones el bot√≥n de encendido para apagar!

Para Tel√©fonos/Tabletas:

  • ‚Ä¢ El bot√≥n de encendido usualmente est√° en el lado
  • ‚Ä¢ Mant√©n presionado por 2-3 segundos para encender
  • ‚Ä¢ Para apagar: Mant√©n presionado, luego desliza para apagar
keyPoints: Siempre usa procedimientos de apagado apropiados
La ubicaci√≥n del bot√≥n de encendido var√≠a por dispositivo
Nunca fuerces el apagado a menos que sea absolutamente necesario
deviceBasics.practiceExercise: Practica encender y apagar tu dispositivo 3 veces usando el m√©todo apropiado.
deviceBasics.animationDesc: Mira c√≥mo presionar correctamente el bot√≥n de encendido

mouseKeyboard.title: Usando Rat√≥n y Teclado
mouseKeyboard.description: Domina los conceptos b√°sicos de los dispositivos de entrada de computadora
mouseKeyboard.content:
Conceptos B√°sicos de Rat√≥n y Teclado

Conceptos B√°sicos del Rat√≥n:

  • ‚Ä¢ Clic izquierdo: Seleccionar elementos, abrir programas
  • ‚Ä¢ Clic derecho: Abrir men√∫s con m√°s opciones
  • ‚Ä¢ Doble clic: Abrir archivos y programas
  • ‚Ä¢ Rueda de desplazamiento: Moverse arriba y abajo en p√°ginas

Elementos Esenciales del Teclado:

  • ‚Ä¢ Barra espaciadora: Agregar espacios entre palabras
  • ‚Ä¢ Enter: Comenzar nueva l√≠nea o confirmar
  • ‚Ä¢ Retroceso: Borrar la letra antes del cursor
  • ‚Ä¢ Shift: Hacer letras may√∫sculas
keyPoints: El clic izquierdo es tu herramienta principal
El clic derecho abre men√∫s √∫tiles
La pr√°ctica hace la perfecci√≥n
mouseKeyboard.practiceExercise: Abre un programa de texto simple y escribe tu nombre, luego b√≥rralo usando retroceso.
mouseKeyboard.animationDesc: Ve c√≥mo hacer clic, doble clic y clic derecho

internetSafety.title: Fundamentos de Seguridad en Internet
internetSafety.description: Mantente seguro en l√≠nea con estos consejos esenciales
internetSafety.content:
Manteni√©ndote Seguro en L√≠nea

Se√±ales de Advertencia de Estafas:

  • ‚Ä¢ Mensajes urgentes pidiendo dinero
  • ‚Ä¢ Solicitudes de contrase√±as o informaci√≥n personal
  • ‚Ä¢ Mensajes de "Has ganado" que no ingresaste
  • ‚Ä¢ Enlaces o archivos adjuntos sospechosos

Consejos de Navegaci√≥n Segura:

  • ‚Ä¢ Busca "https://" en direcciones web
  • ‚Ä¢ Solo descarga de tiendas de aplicaciones oficiales
  • ‚Ä¢ Mant√©n tu software actualizado
  • ‚Ä¢ Usa contrase√±as fuertes y √∫nicas
keyPoints: Nunca des informaci√≥n personal a extra√±os
Cuando tengas dudas, pregunta a una persona de confianza
Las empresas leg√≠timas no pedir√°n contrase√±as por correo
internetSafety.practiceExercise: Identifica 3 se√±ales de advertencia de estafas en l√≠nea de la lecci√≥n.

intermediate.title: Conectando con Familia y Amigos
intermediate.description: Aprende a usar redes sociales, videollamadas y mensajer√≠a de forma segura.

videoCalls.title: Videollamadas con Familia
videoCalls.description: Conecta cara a cara con seres queridos en cualquier lugar
videoCalls.content:
Haciendo Videollamadas

Aplicaciones Populares de Videollamadas:

  • ‚Ä¢ FaceTime (iPhone/iPad): Integrado, muy f√°cil
  • ‚Ä¢ WhatsApp: Funciona en todos los tel√©fonos
  • ‚Ä¢ Zoom: Excelente para llamadas grupales
  • ‚Ä¢ Skype: Funciona en computadoras y tel√©fonos

Antes de tu Llamada:

  • ‚Ä¢ Verifica tu conexi√≥n a internet
  • ‚Ä¢ Encuentra buena iluminaci√≥n (frente a una ventana)
  • ‚Ä¢ Prueba tu c√°mara y micr√≥fono
  • ‚Ä¢ Ten listo el contacto de la persona
keyPoints: La buena iluminaci√≥n hace una gran diferencia
Prueba tu configuraci√≥n antes de llamadas importantes
La mayor√≠a de las aplicaciones funcionan de manera similar una vez que aprendes una
videoCalls.practiceExercise: Haz una videollamada de prueba a un familiar o amigo.

socialMedia.title: Conceptos B√°sicos de Redes Sociales
socialMedia.description: Conecta con amigos y familia en Facebook y otras plataformas
socialMedia.content:
Comenzando con Redes Sociales

Conceptos B√°sicos de Facebook:

  • ‚Ä¢ Crea un perfil con tu nombre real
  • ‚Ä¢ Agrega una foto de perfil bonita
  • ‚Ä¢ Env√≠a solicitudes de amistad a personas que conoces
  • ‚Ä¢ Comparte actualizaciones, fotos y recuerdos

Configuraci√≥n de Privacidad:

  • ‚Ä¢ Solo acepta amigos que realmente conoces
  • ‚Ä¢ Configura publicaciones a "Solo amigos"
  • ‚Ä¢ No compartas informaci√≥n personal p√∫blicamente
  • ‚Ä¢ Revisa qu√© pueden ver otros sobre ti
keyPoints: La configuraci√≥n de privacidad es muy importante
Solo conecta con personas que conoces
Piensa antes de publicar - permanece en l√≠nea
socialMedia.practiceExercise: Configura tu configuraci√≥n de privacidad a "Solo amigos" para publicaciones.

smartHome.title: Dispositivos de Casa Inteligente
smartHome.description: Controla tu hogar con comandos de voz y aplicaciones
smartHome.content:
Conceptos B√°sicos de Casa Inteligente

Dispositivos Inteligentes Populares:

  • ‚Ä¢ Altavoces Inteligentes: Alexa, Google Home
  • ‚Ä¢ Termostatos Inteligentes: Controla temperatura remotamente
  • ‚Ä¢ Luces Inteligentes: Aten√∫a, cambia colores, programa horarios
  • ‚Ä¢ Timbres Inteligentes: Ve qui√©n est√° en la puerta

Comenzando:

  • ‚Ä¢ Comienza con un dispositivo para aprender
  • ‚Ä¢ Descarga la aplicaci√≥n del dispositivo
  • ‚Ä¢ Sigue las instrucciones de configuraci√≥n paso a paso
  • ‚Ä¢ Practica comandos de voz b√°sicos
keyPoints: Comienza simple con un dispositivo
Los comandos de voz hacen la vida m√°s f√°cil
La mayor√≠a de dispositivos tienen aplicaciones √∫tiles
smartHome.practiceExercise: Si tienes un dispositivo inteligente, practica 3 comandos de voz diferentes.

onlineBanking.title: Seguridad en Banca en L√≠nea
onlineBanking.description: Administra tus finanzas de forma segura en l√≠nea
onlineBanking.content:
Banca en L√≠nea Segura

Elementos Esenciales de Seguridad:

  • ‚Ä¢ Siempre escribe la direcci√≥n web de tu banco directamente
  • ‚Ä¢ Busca el √≠cono de candado en tu navegador
  • ‚Ä¢ Nunca uses banca en Wi-Fi p√∫blico
  • ‚Ä¢ Cierra sesi√≥n completamente cuando termines

Qu√© Puedes Hacer en L√≠nea:

  • ‚Ä¢ Verificar saldos de cuentas
  • ‚Ä¢ Ver historial de transacciones
  • ‚Ä¢ Transferir dinero entre cuentas
  • ‚Ä¢ Pagar facturas electr√≥nicamente
keyPoints: La seguridad es la m√°xima prioridad
Tu banco nunca pedir√° contrase√±as por correo
La banca en l√≠nea es muy conveniente cuando se hace de forma segura
onlineBanking.practiceExercise: Visita el sitio web de tu banco y practica iniciar sesi√≥n (no hagas transacciones a√∫n).

ourPromise.title: [es] Our Promise to You
ourPromise.text: [es] At Senior Tech Helper, we understand that your privacy is precious. We're committed to protecting your personal information and being completely transparent about how we use it. This policy explains everything in simple, clear language.

cookies.title: [es] How We Use Cookies
cookies.whatAreCookiesText: [es] Cookies are small text files that help us remember your preferences and make your experience better. Think of them like bookmarks that help us remember where you left off.
cookies.weUseCookiesForTitle: [es] We use cookies ONLY to help you:
uses: [es] Remember your preferences: Text size, voice settings, and accessibility options you've chosen
[es] Keep you signed in: So you don't have to enter your password every time
[es] Improve our help: Understanding which features are most helpful to seniors like you
cookies.whatWeDontDoTitle: [es] What we DON'T do with cookies:

informationCollected.title: [es] What Information We Collect
youGiveUsList: [es] Questions you ask our AI helper
weCollectList: [es] How you use our app (which features help most)

howWeProtect.title: [es] How We Protect Your Information
protections: [es] Encryption: All your data is encrypted (scrambled) so only we can read it
[es] Secure servers: Your information is stored on protected, professional-grade servers
[es] Limited access: Only our essential team members can access your data
[es] Regular security checks: We constantly monitor for any security threats

sharingInformation.title: [es] Sharing Your Information
sharingInformation.neverSell: [es] We will NEVER sell or rent your personal information.
sharingInformation.onlyShareInSituations: [es] We only share your information in these very limited situations:
sharingSituations: [es] With your permission: If you specifically ask us to share something
[es] For technical support: With trusted service providers who help us run the app (they're bound by strict privacy agreements)
[es] If required by law: Only if we're legally required to do so

yourRights.title: [es] Your Rights and Choices
rightsList: [es] See what information we have about you
[es] Ask us to correct any wrong information
[es] Request that we delete your account and data
[es] Turn off cookies in your browser settings
[es] Contact us with any privacy questions
yourRights.noteDeletingCookiesText: [es] If you delete our cookies, you'll need to set up your preferences again, and some features might not work as well.

thirdPartyServices.title: [es] Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.weUseTrustedServices: [es] We use some trusted third-party services to help provide our features:
servicesList: [es] Google AI (Gemini): Powers our AI assistant that answers your questions
[es] Firebase: Securely stores your account information
[es] YouTube/Educational Sites: We may recommend helpful videos and articles
thirdPartyServices.servicesOwnPolicies: [es] These services have their own privacy policies, and we only share the minimum information needed for them to work.

changesToPolicy.title: [es] Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.text: [es] If we need to update this privacy policy, we'll notify you by email and show a notice in the app. We'll always explain what's changing and why in simple, clear language.

contactUs.title: [es] Contact Us
contactUs.questions: [es] Have questions about your privacy or this policy? The TechStep team is here to help!

footer.thankYou: [es] Thank you for trusting TechStep with your information. We're committed to keeping it safe and using it only to help you succeed with technology.
